job.title: Java Software Engineer-Web Services-Mid Level
job.description: Purpose of JobbrbrWe are currently seeking talented Java Software Engineers  Mid Level for our Phoenix AZ facility for teams inside our Chief Administrative Office GroupbrbrUSAA Java Software Engineers create and maintain APIs for our business software applications that our members use Done well many may never realize or appreciate how critical these APIs are or how weve made them simpler Faster Safer Yet they help make our members lives better Its a great challenge and responsibilitybrbrHere you will invent Youll design and test Youll take risks Youll create new technology but the impact youll make on our members will be far more significantbrbrAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualitybrbrJob RequirementsbrbrAs a Java Engineer you are expected to be able to function in a fastpaced environment driving innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development ensuring quality is built into all solutions leveraging TDD Your responsibilities will require you to be knowledgeable in API development You will be a part of teams of developers guiding on engineering and architecture best practices as well as demonstrate the ability to partner and engage with other engineers and architects You will work closely with business clients and UI designers to analyze user requirements code applications and customize andor integrate commercial software packages for both internal employees and external memberfacing applications across multiple platformsbrbrAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualitybrbrThis Job Posting is for multiple openings available in 2021brbrstronguAbout USAAbrbrustrongUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelbrbrUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsbrbrstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliIdentifies and manages existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and the job roleliliEnsures risks associated with business activities are effectively identified measured monitored and controlled liliFollows written risk and compliance policies and procedures for business activitiesliliDesign develop code and test complex technical solutions collaborating with senior engineersliliMay lead codedesign reviews to ensure smooth daily operations and accurate planning at a team levelliliMay begin to organize work and lead team to deliver features and solutionsliliResolves complex production issues with independence by troubleshooting complex applications and systems independentlyliliMay begin mentoring junior engineersbrliulWhen you apply for this position you will be required to answer some initial questions This will take approximately 5 minutes Once you begin the questions you will not be able to finish them at a later time and you will not be able to change your responsesbrbrstronguMinimum RequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of IT experience beyond the minimum required in lieu of a degree liliAND 4 years of software engineeringdevelopment experience utilizing Java with at least 1 years experience working with REST Web ServicesbrliulstronguPreferred Experiencebrustrongulli2 years in REST frameworks with focus on API developmentlili2 years in AGILE methodologylili1 years experience working with JavaScriptlili2 years experience integrating with backend services like JMS J2C ORM frameworks Hibernate JPA JDO etc JDBCliliExperience building APIs with Spring BootliliExperience with event driven frameworks such as Kafka RabbitMQ IBM MQliliAbility to implement container based APIs using a container frameworks OpenShift Docker or KubernetesliliRelational Database design and optimization with Oracle DB2 MySQL PostgressliliFamiliar with Gradle GIT GitHUB GITLab etc around continuous integration and continuous delivery infrastructureliliExperience testing in REST servicesliliExperience in design and develop automated test frameworkbrliulstronguDesired CharacteristicsbrbrustrongUSAA Java Engineers create innovative solutions that impact our members Collectively we arebrulliCurious and excited by new ideasliliEnergized by a fastpaced environmentliliAble to understand and translate business needs into leadingedge technologyliliComfortable working as part of a connected team but selfmotivatedliliCommunityfocused dependable and committedliliExceptionally detailorientedbrliulThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobbrbrstronguCompensationbrbrustrongUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 8820000  15890000  this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationbrbrEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsbrulliGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averagebrliulstrongShift premiumstrong will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursbrbrstrongBenefits strongAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goalsbrbrPlease click on the link below for more detailsbrbrstrongUSAA Total RewardsbrbrstrongstrongRelocationstrong
